trans-unit.source: Contains border styles for the cells in a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 包含中的資料格的框線樣式<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control allows you to fully customize its appearance, including the borders of the cells and headers.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控制項可讓您完全自訂其外觀，包括標頭資料格的框線。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> has <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellBorderStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersBorderStyle%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersBorderStyle%2A> properties that allow you to set the appearance of the cell border.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>具有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellBorderStyle%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersBorderStyle%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersBorderStyle%2A>屬性可讓您設定的儲存格框線外觀。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersBorderStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersBorderStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellBorderStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: However, if you need to further customize the borders, the DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle class allows you to set the style of the border on the individual sides of the cells.
trans-unit.target: 不過，如果您需要進一步自訂框線，DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle 類別可讓您設定在個別的資料格的框線樣式。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Left%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Right%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Top%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Bottom%2A> properties of DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle represent the left, right, top, and bottom border of a cell, respectively.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Left%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Right%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Top%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Bottom%2A>的 DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle 屬性左、 右、 上框線和下框線的儲存格，分別代表。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Bottom%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Top%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Right%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Left%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can set these properties on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedCellBorderStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedColumnHeadersBorderStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedRowHeadersBorderStyle%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> to produce various appearances for the borders between the cells.
trans-unit.target: 您可以設定這些屬性上<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedCellBorderStyle%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedColumnHeadersBorderStyle%2A>，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedRowHeadersBorderStyle%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>來產生不同的儲存格之間的框線外觀。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedRowHeadersBorderStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedColumnHeadersBorderStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedCellBorderStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the border style for all of the borders of a cell.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定針對所有儲存格框線的框線樣式。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Left%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Right%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Top%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Bottom%2A> properties are not set to the same <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle> value, the All property value is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle>.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Left%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Right%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Top%2A>，而<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Bottom%2A>屬性不會設定為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle>值，所有的屬性值為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle>相同</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Bottom%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Top%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Right%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Left%2A>

trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle"></xref>值。

trans-unit.target: 時設定這個屬性不是有效的指定的值<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 指定的值設定這個屬性時是<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle"> </xref>。
